originalText.text: The best form of immediate self-care! I have been wearing contacts/glasses since a very young age that the ritual of having to deal with the unfortunate task of removing/placing contacts into tired eyes on a constant basis felt normal. I can’t explain how life-changing this process is. The staff is extremely thorough, which means you can get the result that you need afterward. I couldn’t be happier with the care I received beforehand, during the process, and afterward. I am recommending Dr. Dello Russo to everyone I know!!!

originalText.text: my surgery it was about 8 minutes, 4 each eye. All the employees were amazing, I highly recommend it. You guys changed my life, I’ll be always be grateful

originalText.text: The staff and doctors Llambriri and Dello Russo were amazingly friendly and thorough. Tatiana was also amazing. The procedure was quick, easy, and pain free. Took about 7 minutes and I was on my way seeing the world without my glasses!

text.text: The staff and doctors Llambriri and Dello Russo were amazingly friendly and thorough. Tatiana was also amazing. The procedure was quick, easy, and pain free. Took about 7 minutes and I was on my way seeing the world without my glasses!

originalText.text: I went in yesterday and the entire staff was professional and made me feel comfortable. I was nervous of course but they calmed me down and assured me everything would be ok. The procedure was quick and painless. The recovery was a little rough but I can now see perfectly. So far so good with just a little soreness. If you want perfect vision this is the place to go!! Thank you Dr. Dello Russo!

text.text: I went in yesterday and the entire staff was professional and made me feel comfortable. I was nervous of course but they calmed me down and assured me everything would be ok. originalText.text: Had my lasik surgery there almost two months ago. So far everything is great. I finally can see. Yay! I loved the office, staff provided me with a very good service. Everyone is nice and kind. Before going there I'd had a couple of appointments with other lasik offices, but after talking with them right away  I decided to do the surgery exactly in this place.. Thank you so much. Will see you guys in my follow up appt in a couple of months.
